name: Island of Survivors
description:
Island of Survivors is a first-person survival and adventure game set on a mysterious island. You are part of a team of three people, and the fate of the group depends on the choices you make. Unlike traditionnal choice-based games, there will be moments when the player can mtake control and dive into the action, much like a first person shooter game. will you be able to leave this island, or will all your attempts lead to a new beginning? (this game is submitted as part of the Brackeys game jam, whose theme is "an end is a new beginning.")

Island of Survivors is entirely designed by a passionate independant developer. The game uses mixamo animations and imported sound (from opengameart) to offer an immersive gameplay experience.
